titles: Presbytery truly display'd, or, An impartial character of the Presbyterian being a vindication of that sanctified party from the virulent calumnies of some foul-mouth'd detractors in this modern age : to which is annexed the ballad of the cloak.
publisher: Printed for the author and sold by W.L. ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
The ballad of the cloak is lacking in filmed copy.
